availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin S. Hamilton (Morgan County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married Juliann Keelin Hamilton in Morgan County, Kentucky, on February 2, 1848. Father of Wallace Hamilton, Sarah A. Hamilton, Nancy A. Hamilton, Joseph Hamilton, Edward Hamilton, Harvey B. Hamilton, Nancy Hamilton, and Samuel D. Hamilton. Laborer in Morgan County in 1850. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Morgan County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 122B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District 1, p. 496.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, River Precinct Number 8, p. 397A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film #000839918, p. 88.
KYR-0001-017-0173.
